description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the Manager Orders Overview screen within a food ordering platform. It builds a UI with a header and placeholder notes for upcoming features, such as order summaries and filters.

classes.name: ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen
classes.description: Stateless widget representing the manager's orders overview screen, including app bar and body with headers and notes.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Private widget for displaying section headers with gradient background and icon.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: Private widget for displaying informational notes with glow effect.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for constructing the widget subtree for 'ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen'.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Build method for rendering the header with gradient, icon, and title.

methods.name: _Note.build
methods.description: Build method for rendering a styled note container with icon and text.
